summary: Vikram is unable to provide the caller with the information they are looking for as the caller is unable to clearly state which company they are calling from or what the exact information they are looking for is. The caller keeps repeating the brand name "Sunfist" hoping that Vikram will figure out that is the company they are calling from but Vikram keeps misunderstanding the callers message and thinks that they are just repeating the name of the company they are calling, "ITC". Eventually the call ends with both parties becoming frustrated.
cohere_points:
- Vikram is an employee at ITC and is talking to a caller who is confused and thinks that they are calling from ITC whereas they are calling from Sunfist which is a product brand of ITC.
- Many unanswered calls happen during the conversation indicating a failed phone call of a wrong number. 

The key phrases are:
- Vikram is an employee at ITC
- ITC is an Indian Tobacco Company
- Caller thinks they are calling ITC but it is Sunfist which is a product brand of ITC
- Many unanswered calls during the conversation
- Failed phone call, wrong number dialed
